description: TEHRAN - Initial studies show that “negligence” in observing “safety standards” is the cause of the Saturday huge inferno at Shahid Rajaei Port in southern Iran, the committee tasked to investigate the incident said in press release on Monday night.
title: Initial studies: Failure to observe safety standards blamed for inferno in Iranian port

description: The Yemeni Armed Forces have carried out two separate retaliatory operations against the USS Harry S. Truman aircraft carrier and its escorts in the Red Sea, and a vital target deep inside the Israeli-occupied territories after fresh US acts of aggression against the Arab country.
title: Yemen strikes US aircraft carrier for deadly attacks

description: TEHRAN-Following the huge explosion at Shahid Rajaee Port in southern Hormozgan Province, which resulted in the death and injury of over 1,200 people, cultural figures have reacted to the unfortunate incident by issuing messages, offering condolences to the Iranian nation and the grieving families.
title: Iran’s cultural community mourns over Shahid Rajaee Port tragedy

description: Nader Talebzadeh hosted hot debates on Iranian TV shows, and made films on the front lines of wars. He was an active participant in the Iranian Revolution of 1979. Ayatollah Khomeini was a bit like Gandhi, he said, in that he told people, “Stay home, don’t work, stop the economy, and the Shah will leave, without violence,” and he did. He told me stories about how the US Embassy takeover there was utterly spontaneous. He made it sound like something from Occupy Wall Street.
title: The New Horizon of Nader Talebzadeh

description: TEHRAN-Iraq will be the Guest of Honor at the 36th Tehran International Book Fair (TIBF), Ebrahim Heidari, Deputy Director of the fair, said at a press conference held on Sunday in Tehran.
title: Iraq designated as Guest of Honor at 36th TIBF

description: A Palestinian envoy has told the International Court of Justice (ICJ) that Israel has used humanitarian aid as a “weapon of war” as Gaza faces humanitarian catastrophe due to months-long Israeli blockade.
title: Israel using Gaza aid as ‘weapon of war’: Palestinian envoy to ICJ

description: TEHRAN - In a commentary, Etemad addressed the challenging conditions of the Iran-U.S. negotiations and wrote: A group of observers believe that Trump's unique instincts and his special negotiating style could possibly lead to a positive outcome, preventing war with Iran and weakening extremists in Washington and Tel Aviv.
title: Conflicting signals from Washington

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Foreign Minister Abbas Araghchi issued a scathing rebuke of Israeli regime’s Benjamin Netanyahu’s calls for dismantling Iran’s nuclear infrastructure, denouncing the remarks as “detached from reality” and a brazen attempt to sabotage Tehran’s diplomatic engagements.
title: Iran FM blasts Netanyahu’s ‘brazen’ interference in Iran-US diplomacy, vows reciprocal response

description: TEHRAN – Iran’s Foreign Ministry condemned the detention of Iranian citizens in France, calling the actions a violation of freedom of expression and urging French authorities to resolve the matter promptly.
title: Detention of Iranian citizens in France violates freedom of expression: Foreign Ministry

description: TEHRAN – Iran and Tunisia may not be close in distance. But between the two capitals located in West Asia and North Africa exists deep mutual respect and common interests.
title: ‘Future of Iran-Tunisia relations holds great promise’

description: TEHRAN – The conflict over Nagorno-Karabakh has been a source of tension between Armenia and Azerbaijan for decades.
title: The road to peace: Iran’s continued support for Armenia-Azerbaijan diplomacy

description: TEHRAN - Azerbaijan stands at the crossroads of continents, cultures, and commerce. Today, the country is fast transforming from a regional player into a pivotal hub for international trade and energy, driven by a dynamic economy, strategic partnerships, and visionary infrastructure development.
title: Azerbaijan: a rising star in regional trade and global energy markets

description: TEHRAN – When Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian landed in Baku on Monday, his visit did more than yield seven signed cooperation agreements—it exposed the cracks in a decades-old foreign strategy to Balkanize the Caucasus.
title: Diplomatic dawn in the Caucasus: How Iran-Azerbaijan unity exposes Israel’s fraying playbook

description: TEHRAN - Azerbaijan's foreign policy is characterized by a strategic balance between major global powers and its regional neighbors. This approach allows Azerbaijan to keep its independence and use its geopolitical position as leverage.
title: Between the East and West: Azerbaijan’s playbook for strategic pragmatism

description: TEHRAN – Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian concluded a one-day visit to Baku, Azerbaijan, on Monday, marking a significant step towards revitalizing and strengthening relations between the two neighboring nations.
title: On the path to friendship

description: TEHRAN – In a recent interview with Azerbaijani Television (AzTV), President Masoud Pezeshkian of Iran articulated Iran's unwavering commitment to the principles of international law, particularly the respect for the rights and territorial integrity of all nations, calling it "the first and foremost principle of international law."
title: Iran’s President calls Azerbaijan ‘second home’ as he urges deeper Tehran-Baku ties

description: U.S. President Donald Trump has posted on his Truth Social account urging Canadians to vote towards becoming "the cherished 51st State of the United States of America".
title: Trump calls on Canada to vote for becoming 'cherished' 51st US state

description: BEIRUT — In a flagrant violation of the ceasefire and the Lebanese sovereignty, and in continuation of the U.S.-Israeli strategy pursued since the ceasefire agreement last November, the Israeli regime launched an aerial attack on the southern suburbs of Beirut on Sunday evening.
title: New segment of Israel’s pressure on Lebanon

description: BEIRUT — In a flagrant violation of the ceasefire and the Lebanese sovereignty, and in continuation of the U.S.-Israeli strategy pursued since the ceasefire agreement last November, the Israeli regime launched an aerial attack on the southern suburbs of Beirut on Sunday evening.
title: New stage of Israel’s pressure on Lebanon

description: Gaza’s Health Ministry on Monday just issued its daily statistical report on Palestinian casualties in Israel’s war on the enclave.
title: Israel kills 71 Palestinians in the past 24 hours: Ministry

description: TEHRAN – U.S. airstrike kills and injures scores of African migrants in Yemen, marking the latest civilian casualties in America’s aggression.
title: U.S. airstrike kills scores in Yemen

description: Russian President Vladimir Putin has unilaterally declared a three-day ceasefire in Ukraine from May 8 to coincide with World War II Victory Day commemorations, the Kremlin said Monday, according to CNN.
title: Putin announces three-day truce in Ukraine from May 8

description: Severe power outages have affected the Spanish capital, Madrid, as well as other major cities across the country, including Barcelona, Seville and Valencia, CNN reported.
title: Madrid’s trains and international airport among facilities hit by power outages

description: Palestinian Authority (PA) President Mahmoud Abbas has named a deputy and likely successor, Middle East Eye reported.
title: Mahmoud Abbas names Hussein al-Sheikh as vice president and likely successor

description: The Israeli foreign minister says the top UN court’s hearing on humanitarian aid to Gaza was part of a “systematic persecution and delegitimization” of his country.
title: Israel’s foreign minister blasts ICJ hearing on Gaza

description: Pakistani Railway Minister Hanif Abbasi, in a dramatic escalation of tensions, threatened India with nuclear retaliation, claiming that Pakistan’s missile arsenal, including Ghori, Shaheen, and Ghaznavi missiles, along with 130 nuclear warheads, has been kept “only for India,”
title: 130 nuclear warheads, missiles targeted at India: Pakistan minister

description: The last time Pope Francis called the Palestinians of Gaza and gave them his blessings was two days before he passed away on 21 April. His funeral was held on Saturday in St Peter's Basilica, drawing mourners from around the world.
title: Pope Francis defied Western silence on Gaza, but Vatican complicity endures

description: Canadians head to the polls in a federal election overshadowed by fury at Donald Trump’s threats to the country’s sovereignty and fears over his escalating trade war.
title: Canadians vote in an election upturned by Trump

description: TEHRAN--Darsajin village is located 15 km off Abhar, Zanjan province. It is known as Zanjan’s Abyaneh due to its historical texture, rich culture and pristine nature.
title: Darsajin village in Zanjan resembles historical Abyaneh

description: TEHRAN--Inverted tulips are stunningly in tune with spring and are a delight in the lap of four-season nature of Kohgiluyeh-Boyerahmad province and in slopes of Dena Mountain, Sarchenar, Margoon, Kakan, and Sisakht.
title: Inverted tulips blossom in Kohgiluyeh-Boyerahmad province

description: TEHRAN – Iranian Deputy Tourism Minister Anoushirvan Mohseni Bandpei and Managing Director of Pakistan Tourism Development Corporation (PTDC) Aftab ur Rehman Rana urged on rise in number of direct flights between Iran and Pakistan, using health tourism capacities of Iran and holding sightseeing tours.
title: Iran, Pakistan urge for rise in direct flights

description: TEHRAN--Farzad Ojani, an official with the Ministry of Cultural Heritage, Tourism and Handicrafts, said 100 artisans and producers of handicrafts have taken part at the 7th Exhibition of Export Capabilities of the Islamic Republic of Iran, IRAN EXPO 2025.
title: 100 artisans take part at IRAN EXPO 2025

description: TEHRAN – Iran are drawn with six-time champions Japan in the AFC U20 Women’s Asian Cup Qualifiers 2026.
title: Iran drawn with Japan in AFC U20 Women’s Asian Cup Qualifiers 2026

description: Following the massive explosion at Shahid Rajaee Port on Saturday, many people rushed to donate blood to help the people injured during the incident.
title: Blood donors help people injured in port explosion

description: Following the massive explosion at Shahid Rajaee Port on Saturday, many people rushed to donate blood to help the people injured during the incident.
title: Blood donors help people injured in port explosion as death toll reaches 65

description: TEHRAN – Health Minister Mohammad-Reza Zafarqandi and Russia’s deputy health minister Oleg Salagay have discussed ways of enhancing ties in the health sector.
title: Tehran, Moscow hold talks on promoting health co-op

description: TEHRAN –Iranian and Turkish officials have conferred on ways to further scientific and technological collaborations, focusing on setting up a joint research center for digital economy.
title: Iran, Turkey explore paths to beef up scientific ties

description: TEHRAN –Attending the second International Mathematics Olympiad for high school students in Turkmenistan, Iranian students managed to win seven bronze medals.
title: Iranian schoolchildren succeed in Intl. Mathematics Olympiad

description: TEHRAN –The second national congress on Persian medicine is scheduled to be held from November 12 to 14 in Tehran.
title: 2nd national congress on Persian medicine slated for November

description: TEHRAN- Iranian industry, mining and trade minister said that the cooperation between the private sectors of Iran and Uzbekistan will continue at an accelerated pace.
title: ‘Iran, Uzbekistan private sectors co-op to continue at an accelerated pace’

description: TEHRAN- TEDPIX, the main index of the Tehran Stock Exchange (TSE), rose 12,335 points to 3.151 million on Monday, which is the third day of the Iranian calendar week.
title: TEDPIX gains 12,0000 points on Monday

description: TEHRAN - Trade between Iran and Africa is experiencing significant growth, with both sides actively pursuing new opportunities in key sectors such as energy, industry, and agriculture. The Iranian government has emphasized its commitment to enhancing commercial relations with African nations, leveraging strategic initiatives aimed at boosting trade volumes.
title: Iran, Africa seek expansion of ties in a variety of areas

description: TEHRAN – Iran Expo 2025, the seventh Exhibition of Export Capabilities of the Islamic Republic of Iran, officially opened on Monday in Tehran, with President Masoud Pezeshkian highlighting the country’s economic potential and welcoming foreign investment.
title: Iran Expo 2025 kicks off in Tehran

description: TEHRAN - The Iranian women’s baseball team encountered difficulties during their participation in the IV BFA Women’s Baseball Asian Cup Qualifiers, held recently in Bangkok, Thailand.
title: Iran face challenges in IV BFA Women’s Baseball Asian Cup Qualifiers

description: TEHRAN – Turkish-German football coach Engin Fırat emphasizes that Iran needs to focus on developing its infrastructure, similar to what Saudi Arabia has begun to do.
title: Iran must develop infrastructure: Engin Fırat

description: TEHRAN- Trade relations between Iran and the Republic of Azerbaijan have seen remarkable growth in recent years. By leveraging their cultural, historical, and geographical commonalities, the two countries have worked to expand their economic cooperation through joint projects, border trade exchanges, and the development of transit corridors.
title: New chapter opens in Iran-Azerbaijan trade, transport, energy ties

description: TEHRAN-The 6th edition of the 5 Film & Photo Awards has announced the members of the jury for the photo section.
title: 5 Film & Photo Awards announces photo jury team
